title: Oh Happy Day
description: Oh Happy Day is a vivid and reminiscent portrait of rural community life in Trinidad. Set in various parts of the country, each story is reflective of a distinct character immersed in an assortment of scenarios. Expect to be delightfully entertained as natural dialogue sets the scene for adventure, humour, gossip, romance, betrayal and drama in this captivating and fictionalized novel.
author: Michelle Ragoonanan-Ali
